Sequence Information.Peptide Name: DLP2 (defensin-like peptide 2; natural AMPs; insects; arthropods, invertebrates, animals; 3S=S; UCSS1a)

Literature Information.Literature:
APD analysis reveals that the sequence of this peptide shows 85% similarity toDLP4.  GRAVY: 0.1375; Mol Wt: 4277.088; Mol formula: C177H290N61O48S7; mol ex coeff.: 5925.
Most similar to AP2904.  Initially reported in 2015 (see Ref).Activity: DLP2 is now expressed, purified and proved to have antimicrobial activity against S. aureus (MRSA) byLi Z et al. 2017. Not active: Gram- bacteria: E.coli CVCC1515 (MIC >128 ug/ml; ~30 uM), E.coli CICC21530 (serotype O157:H7) (MIC> 128 ug/ml), S.typhimurium ATCC14028 (MIC >128 ug/ml), S.enteritidis CMCC50336 (MIC >128 ug/ml).  In addition, animal model:mouse: DLP2 can protect mice from MRSA infection at 3-7.5 mg/kg. Seq updated 7/2021
Literature Information.Author: Park SI, Kim JW, Yoe SM.2015
Literature Information.Title: Purification and characterization of a novel antibacterial peptide from black soldier fly (Hermetia illucens) larvae
